DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy telcagepant ( MK-0974 ) acute treatment multiple migraine attack without aura . Primary hypothesis study telcagepant superior placebo , measure proportion participant pain freedom , pain relief , pain freedom consistency , pain relief consistency , absence photophobia , phonophobia , nausea 2 hour post-dose .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Attacks Study Compare Efficacy Safety MK-0974 With Placebo Acute Migraine ( MK-0974-031 )
DOC.criteria: History migraine within past year 1 8 moderate severe migraine attack per month past 2 month last 4 72 hour untreated Use acceptable contraception throughout study Able complete study questionnaire ( ) paper diary Limit consumption grapefruit juice one 8 ounce glass day Pregnant breastfeeding expect become pregnant study Difficulty distinguish his/her migraine attack tension interval headaches A history mostly mild migraine attack migraine usually resolve spontaneously less 2 hour More 15 headachedays per month take medication acute headache 10 day month past 3 month Greater 50 year old age migraine onset Previously take telcagepant
DOC.keyword: multiple attack moderate severe migraine headache
